extensionDescription.message: Modify request and response headers through the DeclarativeNetRequest API

optionUrlPatternDescription.message: An ASCII-only regular expression to filter network request URLs. URLs are provided in punycode format (for internationalized domains) with non-ASCII characters percent-encoded in UTF-8.

optionActionDescription.message: The operation to be performed on the header.

optionActionChromeDescription.message: In Chromium-based browsers, "append" is supported for the following request headers: Accept, Accept-Encoding, Accept-Language, Access-Control-Request-Headers, Cache-Control, Connection, Content-Language, Cookie, Forwarded, If-Match, If-None-Match, Keep-Alive, Range, Te, Trailer, Transfer-Encoding, Upgrade, Via, Want-Digest, X-Forwarded-For.

optionPriorityDescription.message: Priority in which the rules will be applied. The lower the number, the higher the priorty. Default is 1.

errFilterInvalid.message: URL Pattern must be valid regex.

errTooManyRules.message: Too many rules. Note that other extensions may add rules as well.

errorWhileSaving.message: An unknown error occurred while saving.
